description: This file contains styles for a React application, including variables for theming, component styles, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered text and theming support.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animation for rotation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles that hold and align the main content of the app.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styles for toggling themes, including hover and active states.
